Live Streaming Integration For All Your Virtual Event Needs

March 26, 2020 · Product Updates

With the unprecedented epidemic that has taken the world by storm, event deferment and cancelation have impacted the M.I.C.E industry in many ways. Event organisers are now being ‘forced’ to host virtual events. As a home grown end to end provider for M.I.C.E event solutions, we have made virtual events now possible to host digitally and interactively- without geographical constraints!

Discover how Micepad can supercharge your online virtual events (webinars, conferences, e-learning purpose, AGMS, single or multiple days events) with these newly introduced live streaming solutions hosted directly within Micepad Mobile App. That’s right – an all in one solution for virtual events! Less sweat for our event planning friends amidst this pandemic!

Integrate Facebook Live, Vimeo LiveStream and Youtube Live (Zoom, coming soon!) streaming easily without writing any code. Hop on here for a simple guide *(​How to Host a Virtual Event) *that we’ve put together on how to convert your offline event to a phenomenal virtual experience.
